title: PLEASE HELP TO IDENTIFY FONT!
content:
Hey folks,

I need all of your support to help me to identify this font.

Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Logo1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821074719/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo1.jpg) | 39.66 KB |
author: HaleBOP

comments.content: Coolvetica by Ray Larabie [Typodermic] is close, as is Alte Haas. The straight stem bottom on the "a" is telling.
